name: libGDX vs Ray3k
description:
A game made for the libGDX Jam of June 2020. The theme was Tower Defense Without Towers, however I didn't have enough time to complete. The goal was to make a single player mode where you defended points on a map and entered battles.

Nevertheless, it's cool to have made a local multiplayer Smash Bros. clone featuring many members from the libGDX community. If I didn't include you, don't be offended. I seriously did not have the time to complete this  despite working on it 10+ hours a day for a whole week.

Not all moves have been completed for every character. Please see the bindings in the options menu. Hold a direction and press attack/special to do another move! Controller support is experiencing technical difficulties.
